no-cf.advice-can-fix-text: to fix your connections or connect to new endpoints.

admin.line2: there are no spaces where you can add any.

non-admin.line1: You have no applications and cannot add any.

errors.single-endpoint-down: The Console could not connect to the endpoint named "{{name}}". Try reconnecting to this endpoint to resolve this problem.
errors.multiple-endpoint-down: The Console could not connect to multiple endpoints. Use the Endpoints dashboard to manage your endpoints.

add-app-dialog.title: @:app-wall.add-application
add-app-dialog.name-message: Enter a unique name for your application.
add-app-dialog.app-name-error-used: This name already exists. Choose a new one.

notifications.success: A new application and route have been created for '{{ appName }}'
notifications.failure-part-1: There was a problem creating your application.
notifications.failure-part-1-alt: The following exception occurred when creating your application: {{ error }}.
notifications.failure-part-2: Please try again or contact your administrator if the problem persists.

route.exists: This route already exists. Choose a new one.
route.failure-part-1: There was a problem validating your route.
route.failure-part-1-alt: The following exception occurred when validating your route: {{ error }}.
route.failure-part-2: Please try again or contact your administrator if the problem persists.
